hackathon-description-text: We're proud to announce the UK's largest collaborative student-run hackathon, HackLondon.
hackathon-eligibility: This event is strictly 18+. Any enrolled undergraduate or postgraduate student, or graduates who are less than a year out of university can attend HackLondon. Students will be required to show their student ID in order to enter the hackathon.
hackathon-rules:
- As always, you cannot work on your hack before HackLondon starts or after it finishes. You are of course free to come up with your idea though
- Teams are groups of up to 4 people. You can come by yourself but the more the merrier! 
- Make sure to follow the

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: £50 Amazon Voucher, X4 Quadcopter, Sphero, HackCampus Fast-Track Internship Program

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Judges will be judging based on the usual sort of criteria - technical implementation, creativity etc.
